function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of affordable housing and economic hardship leading to eviction and housing displacement","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 infection and mortality rates","Mitigation":"Increase access to affordable housing and financial support for low-income populations","Technologies":"Affordable housing initiatives, financial assistance programs","People":"Low-income populations, communities of color","Owner":"Government, housing organizations"},{"Description":"Disproportionate economic hardship and impacts of the virus on low-income and minority communities","Impact":"Exacerbation of economic hardships and increased vulnerability to COVID-19","Mitigation":"Equitable distribution of resources and support to affected communities","Technologies":"Community outreach programs, financial relief initiatives","People":"Low-income and minority communities","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Association between housing displacement and increased COVID-19 infection and mortality rates","Impact":"Heightened risk of virus transmission and adverse health outcomes","Mitigation":"Implement strategies to prevent housing displacement and provide support to displaced individuals","Technologies":"Community health interventions, housing stability programs","People":"Individuals at risk of displacement","Owner":"Local government, community health organizations"}]}
